item.title: Matching /dev/hidraw* devices with physical devices
item.description: During development of ContourUSB device driver (I’ ve dedicated a post for this one) I had a hard time detecting the hidraw device created for the meter. I’ ve been suggested to just print all available hidraw devices (pseudo files), then plug the meter and re-print hidraw devices to detect which one was just created.
